holidays.title: National Garlic Day
holidays.description: One thing's obvious: There's a certain something in the air during National Garlic Day.

holidays.title: Refresh Your Goals Day
holidays.description: This is the perfect time to refocus and refresh your personal goals.

holidays.title: Congenital Diaphragmatic Hernia Action Day
holidays.description: Are you ready to learn about Congenital Diaphragmatic Hernia and spread awareness about it?

holidays.title: Dutch-American Friendship Day
holidays.description: Don’t miss celebrating Dutch-American Friendship Day. It’s a special day to spend time with your friends.

holidays.title: Humorous Day
holidays.description: This is a day designed to urge us to see the silver lining in every situation.

holidays.title: John Parker Day
holidays.description: Celebrate determination and bravery in the face of danger on John Parker Day.

holidays.title: Landing of the 33 Patriots Day
holidays.description: Wave your flags up in the air to celebrate Landing of the 33 Patriots Day.

holidays.title: National Amaretto Day
holidays.description: Savor the rich, strong, velvety taste of almond-flavored liqueur goodness this National Amaretto Day.

holidays.title: National Banana Day
holidays.description: What an amazing time to celebrate the awesomeness of the world’s most popular fruit — the banana!

holidays.title: National Cat Lady Day
holidays.description: Get ready to spoil your furry pal as we celebrate National Cat Lady Day.

holidays.title: National Dog Parent Appreciation Day
holidays.description: Who let the dogs out? Not dog parents, that’s for sure. Let’s celebrate these responsible heroes!

holidays.title: National Hanging Out Day
holidays.description: Ditch your dryers and hang your clothes outside as we celebrate the National Hanging Out Day.

holidays.title: National Hayden Day
holidays.description: Learn more about this charming, unisex name that has its origins in the Old English language.

holidays.title: National North Dakota Day
holidays.description: Find out how to best celebrate National North Dakota Day right here with us!

holidays.title: National Oklahoma City Bombing Commemoration Day
holidays.description: Be ready to commemorate this unique day. This terrorist attack should be remembered.

holidays.title: National Poker Day
holidays.description: Put your money where your mouth is as we celebrate National Poker Day.

holidays.title: Poetry & The Creative Mind Day
holidays.description: Today, we celebrate how words have the power to rouse hearts, shape perspectives, and broaden minds.

holidays.title: Rice Ball Day
holidays.description: Help yourself to a huge serving of rice balls today to satisfy your cravings.

holidays.title: Sylvester the Cat's Birthday
holidays.description: Let’s root for Sylvester! Being his special day, maybe things will today go well for him.

holidays.title: Youth Homelessness Matters Day
holidays.description: Let’s raise awareness to support the youth experiencing or at risk of homelessness.

holidays.title: Hayden Christensen’s Birthday
holidays.description: “Don't dream it, do it,” best describes this famous talented award-winning actor and producer.

holidays.title: James Franco’s Birthday
holidays.description: This immensely multi-talented and skillful actor has always been a high flyer.

holidays.title: Jeremy Hutchins’s Birthday
holidays.description: This increasingly beloved internet star is a force to be reckoned with.

holidays.title: Joanna Gaines’s Birthday
holidays.description: This brilliant T.V. presenter has many talents — she is a true all-rounder!

holidays.title: Kate Hudson’s Birthday
holidays.description: This award-winning actress and businesswoman has always been an unstoppable force.

holidays.title: Loren Gray’s Birthday
holidays.description: This multi-talented singer and internet star has always been a high achiever!
